omniscience.title:
§aDissolution
§8You gain Dissolution equal to the life you lose for four seconds, lowering your Maximum Health.
§8You are at Maximum Health while you have Dissolution.
§4The spirit is willing, but the flesh is weak.

healconvert.title: §g+6% Attack Damage Gained as Healing Power

imbalanced_guard.title:
§gImbalanced Guard
§8-50% Armor. +150% Armor Toughness.
§4We have less steel, but we are willing to bleed,
§4and that is why we will be victorious.

blessed_armor.title:
§gBlessed Armor 
§820% of damage absorbed by armor recovered as Absorption. 
You have 60% less maximum Reabsorption.
§4My faith is my shield.

magebane.title:
§gUndying
§8-20% Maximum Life. +100% of damage to Life is Recouped over 4 seconds.
§4You're gonna to have to try a little harder than that.

blur.title:
§gUndertaker
§8100% Movement Efficiency. You sneak as fast as you walk. You can sprint while sneaking.
§4Some tasks are too important to entrust to others.

brittle_defense.title:
§gBrittle Barrier
§8Take 30% less damage if you haven't been hit within the last 4 seconds, 
§8lingering for the same amount after you are hit. 
§8You take 30% more damage otherwise. 
§4Invite the enemy when you are
strong, evade them when you are weak.

cull.title:
§gSlayer
§8You and your enemies die instantly upon being left below 20% maximum health by an enemy.
§4Those who take up the sword shall surely perish by the sword.

discipline.title:
§9Prismatic Steel
§g+100% of Attack Damage gained as Arcane, Frost, and Fire Spell Power. 40% less attack damage.
§4 Prismatic steel-warm to the touch, yet chills to the bone.

loaded_dice.title:
§1Eyes of Ambition
§8Always critically strike with spells. -50%[x] Spell Damage.
§4He had visions of greatness for himself. So We took his eyes, yet he sees more clearly than ever.

throatseeker.title:
§1Ironpiercer
§8Enemies have -10 and -40% Armor against your attacks. Enemies have +10 Armor Toughness against your attacks.
§8 +20% Attack Damage.
§4All it takes is one, clean stab.

empiresgrasp.title:
§1Empire's Reach 
§8+50% Attack and Entity Interaction Range. -60% Knockback against Enemies. 
§4Your reach exceeds your grasp.

ethereal.title:
§EEthereal 
§8+100%[x] Reabsorption. +5 Reabsorption 
§8-90%[x] Maximum Life. 
§4When the body is wrung dry, the soul is left to do the bleeding.

agnostic.title: §8+4% chance to reduce damage taken by 35%

glancing.title: §8+8% chance to reduce damage taken by 35%
